src:
Hasil Lengkap Serie A Pekan ke-11: Dua Pemuncak Klasemen Masih Perkasa
04 Nov 2019, 16:12 by Anggi Tiar


Hasil Lengkap Serie A Pekan ke-11: Dua Pemuncak Klasemen Masih Perkasa

KBRN, Jakarta : Pekan ke-11 Serie A atau Liga Italia 2019-2020 telah selesai dilangsungkan. Dua tim pemuncak klasemen yakni, Juventus dan Inter Milan masih perkasa. Ya, kedua tim raksasa itu berhasil meraih kemenangan tipis saat bertandang ke markas lawannya dan tetap berada di puncak klasemen sementara Liga Italia. Juventus sendiri berhasil meraih kemenangan dalam laga Derby della Mole menghadapi Torino. Gol tunggal Matthijs de Ligt membawa Juventus menang tipis 1-0 atas Torino. Sama halnya dengan Juventus, Inter Milan juga meraih kemenangan tipis saat bertandang ke markas Bologna. Bermain di Stadion Dell'Ara, Inter Milan menang dengan skor 1-2. Dua gol Inter Milan dicetak Romelu Lukaku.Dengan hasil kemenangan ini, Juventus dan Inter Milan masih memimpin di puncak klasemen. Juventus sendiri tetap kokoh di peringkat tertinggi dengan raihan 29 poin dari 11 pertandingan. Sedangkan Inter Milan berada di tempat kedua dengan selisih satu poin dari Juventus. Berikut Hasil Lengkap Serie A Pekan ke-11:Sabtu (02/11/19)Roma 2 - 1 NapoliMinggu (03/11/19)Bologna 1 - 2 Inter MilanTorino 0 - 1 JuventusAtalanta 0 - 2 CagliariGenoa 1 - 3 UdineseHellas Verona 2 - 1 BresciaLecce 2 - 2 SassuoloSenin (04/11/19)Fiorentina 1 - 1 ParmaMilan 1 - 2 LazioSelasa (05/11/19)SPAL vs Sampdoria (pukul 02.45 WIB)
(Foto: istimewa)
text:
Complete results of Serie A Week 11: The top two standings are still mighty
Nov 04 2019, 16:12 by Anggi Tiar


Complete results of Serie A Week 11: The top two standings are still mighty

KBRN, Jakarta: Week 11 of Serie A or the 2019-2020 Italian League has been completed. The top two standings, Juventus and Inter Milan, are still powerful. Yes, the two giant teams managed to achieve a narrow victory when they travel to their opponent's headquarters and remain at the top of the Italian league standings. Juventus themselves won the Derby della Mole match against Torino. Matthijs de Ligt's single goal gave Juventus a narrow 1-0 win over Torino. Similar to Juventus, Inter Milan also won a narrow victory when they travel to the headquarters of Bologna. Playing at the Dell'Ara Stadium, Inter Milan won with a score of 1-2. Two Inter Milan goals scored by Romelu Lukaku. With this victory, Juventus and Inter Milan still lead at the top of the table. Juventus itself remains firm in the highest rankings with 29 points from 11 matches. While Inter Milan is in second place by one point difference from Juventus. Here are the complete results of Serie A Week 11: Saturday (02/11/19) Roma 2 - 1 Napoli Sunday (11/03/19) Bologna 1 - 2 Inter Milan Torino 0 - 1 JuventusAtalanta 0 - 2 CagliariGenoa 1 - 3 UdineseHellas Verona 2 - 1 BresciaLecce 2 - 2 Sassuolo Monday (04/11/19) Fiorentina 1 - 1 ParmaMilan 1 - 2 Lazio Tuesday (05/11/19) SPAL vs Sampdoria (02.45 WIB)
(Photo: special)
